name: French Toasts, Pancakes And Other Breakfast Options
description: French toasts, pancakes and other breakfast options. Delicious recipes for breakfast, all healthy and easy and all vegan.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon bob's red mill 7 grain Organic pancake mix Or whole wheat flour+1/4 teaspoon baking powder
1 teaspoon cocoa powder for chocolate toasts ((3 strawberries for strawberry toasts, 1/4 cup blueberries for blueberry batter))
3-6 tablespoons of warm water ((3 Tbsps when using fruits or agave syrup, more when no fruit))
3-4 Tablespoons Bob's red mill Organic 7 grain pancake mix (already has leavening agent)
1 teaspoon canola oil or coconut oil
3-4 tablespoons water or non dairy milk
2 tablespoons dried or fresh blueberries (raisins, dried cranberries, dried fruit or chocolate chips)

itemListElement.text: Blend all ingredients in blender. Adjust water to get a thick puree.
itemListElement.name: Blend all ingredients in blender. Adjust water to get a thick puree.

itemListElement.text: Dip slices in puree and pan fry with little oil, on low medium heat, 2-3 minutes each side.
itemListElement.name: Dip slices in puree and pan fry with little oil, on low medium heat, 2-3 minutes each side.

itemListElement.text: Serve topped with Maple/Agave/any syrup, fruit compote or preserves.
itemListElement.name: Serve topped with Maple/Agave/any syrup, fruit compote or preserves.

itemListElement.text: Quickies: A good number of times, we eat the breads that I make, toasted or not, with preserves, nut butters or spreads or chutneys and some fresh fruits.
itemListElement.name: Quickies: A good number of times, we eat the breads that I make, toasted or not, with preserves, nut butters or spreads or chutneys and some fresh fruits.

itemListElement.text: Puree the fruits, lemon juice, sugar and oil. Mix in the dried fruit or chocolate chips. Let sit for 5 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Puree the fruits, lemon juice, sugar and oil. Mix in the dried fruit or chocolate chips. Let sit for 5 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Mix all the other ingredients and fruit puree in a bowl. Adjust water to get a runny muffin type mixture.
itemListElement.name: Mix all the other ingredients and fruit puree in a bowl. Adjust water to get a runny muffin type mixture.

itemListElement.text: Drop ladle-full on heated and greased( oil or vegan butter) thick bottom pan. Cook partially covered for 3-4 minutes, on medium-low heat, flip and cook for another 3 minutes. Serve topped with syrups or fruits, compote/chutneys or nut butters.
itemListElement.name: Drop ladle-full on heated and greased( oil or vegan butter) thick bottom pan. Cook partially covered for 3-4 minutes, on medium-low heat, flip and cook for another 3 minutes. Serve topped with syrups or fruits, compote/chutneys or nut butters.
